exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LoadingRunSkin" width="1080" height="1920" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect right="0" y="12" top="0" bottom="0" width="20" left="0" height="20" alpha="0.5" x="6"/>
	<e:Image id="loading" x="324" y="579" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="190" height="190" anchorOffsetX="95" anchorOffsetY="95" source="loading_run"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="TipsSkin" width="1080" height="1920" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image x="130" y="524" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" touchEnabled="false" source="toastbg" scaleX="1.2" scaleY="1.2"/>
	<e:Label id="tipslabel" x="377" y="815" width="417" height="126" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" touchEnabled="false" horizontalCenter="-0.5" verticalCenter="1" size="55" text="提示" textColor="0xFFFFFF" bold="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="DialogUiSkin" width="1080" height="1920" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect y="0" id="_mask" width="1080" height="1920" alpha="0.5" x="0"/>
	<e:Group id="MianGourp" verticalCenter="0" y="10" x="10" width="1080" height="1920" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Image source="CommoBg1" y="322" scale9Grid="129,187,781,1127" width="898" height="1023" x="112"/>
		<e:Image source="CommoBg2" y="603" scale9Grid="131,171,615,1030" width="789" height="585" x="164"/>
		<e:Image source="Title" y="272" x="130"/>
		<e:Image source="Title" y="272" x="969" scaleX="-1"/>
		<e:Image id="closebt" source="CommoCloseBt" y="345" x="906"/>
		<e:Label id="MessageLabel" text="Message" x="161" y="666" width="712" height="472" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" textColor="0x000000" size="45"/>
		<e:Label text="提 示" x="420" y="242" width="230" size="85" textColor="0xFFF8F8" bold="true" strokeColor="0x6A1186" stroke="1"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="CommonMainSkin" width="1080" height="1920" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<ns1:LoadingRun id="_loadingrun" x="400" y="394" skinName="LoadingRunSkin" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
	<ns1:TipsCommon id="_tips" x="446" y="460" skinName="TipsSkin" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" alpha="0" touchEnabled="false" visible="false"/>
	<ns1:DialogUi id="_DialogUi" x="227" y="485" skinName="DialogUiSkin" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="Genera1Skin" width="483" height="402" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="MianGourp" height="402" width="483" y="0" x="1">
		<e:Image source="shadow1" x="-81" y="106" scaleX="0.87" scaleY="0.87"/>
		<e:Image y="57" x="34" id="img" scaleX="0.87" scaleY="0.87" source="Genera1_1" width="453" height="261"/>
		<e:Image source="Genera1_2" y="169" id="Imgleft" skewY="30" x="35" width="227" height="127"/>
		<e:Image source="Genera1_3" y="280" id="ImgRigth" skewY="-30" x="231" width="228" height="127"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Rect x="222" ellipseHeight="20" y="157" ellipseWidth="20" width="20" height="20" id="m_CenterImg" fillColor="0xFF1818"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="JumperClassSkin" width="123" height="247" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="CenterEff" x="57" y="208.5" source="CenterEff" anchorOffsetX="258.5" anchorOffsetY="128.5" scaleX="0.1" scaleY="0.1"/>
	<e:Group id="MianGourp" height="247" width="123" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Image source="Peoplesharde" x="-41" y="148"/>
		<e:Image id="_JumpEffImg" x="-86" y="53" horizontalCenter="0.5" verticalCenter="82.5" source="absorption4" visible="false"/>
		<e:Image id="_jumper" x="372" y="200" horizontalCenter="5.5" verticalCenter="-77" source="JumperR1" visible="false"/>
		<e:Image id="JumperBoby" x="27" y="111" source="JumperBoby" horizontalCenter="3"/>
		<e:Image id="JumperHead" x="26" y="23" source="JumperHeadR" horizontalCenter="-4"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="_FallGourp" height="247" width="123" y="0">
		<e:Image id="_FallenOn" x="20" y="18" source="FallenOn1"/>
		<e:Image id="_FallenL" x="-113" y="22" source="FallenL1"/>
		<e:Image id="_FallenR" x="22" y="34" source="FallenR1"/>
		<e:Image id="_FallenBottom" x="-114" y="27" source="FallenBottom1"/>
		<e:Label id="_AddScoreLale" text="+1" x="-194" y="5" textColor="0x000000" size="35" bold="true" width="490" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PageSecen2Skin" width="1080" height="1920" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="Page2Bg" x="0" y="0" verticalCenter="0" left="0" bottom="0" right="0" top="0"/>
	<e:Image id="StartGameBt" source="Page2Item3" x="388" y="1531" verticalCenter="700" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="_rank" source="Page2Item2" x="190" y="1764" verticalCenter="848" horizontalCenter="-245"/>
	<e:Image id="_Rules" source="Page2Item1" x="637" y="1757" horizontalCenter="242" verticalCenter="845"/>
	<e:Group height="200" width="200" x="783" y="1401">
		<e:Image id="_MyLuckyIco" source="MyLuckyIco" x="54" y="36"/>
		<e:Image id="IsRead" source="MyLuckyRed" x="124" y="38" visible="false"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PageSecen1Skin" width="1080" height="1920" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="bg1" x="0" y="0" right="0" bottom="0" left="0" top="0"/>
	<e:Image source="Page1Bg" x="0" y="0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="NextSecen" source="Page1Text" x="200" y="340" verticalCenter="-458" horizontalCenter="-8.5"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="FilliInfoSkin" width="1080" height="1920" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect right="0" y="40" top="0" bottom="0" width="1080" left="0" height="1920" alpha="0.5" x="40"/>
	<e:Image source="FilliInfoItem1" x="292" y="212" horizontalCenter="8.5" top="171"/>
	<e:Image source="FilliInfoItem2" x="205" y="896" horizontalCenter="8.5" top="770"/>
	<e:Image source="FilliInfoItem3" x="92" y="368" top="340" horizontalCenter="24"/>
	<e:Image id="SubmitBt" source="Button9" x="340" y="1316" horizontalCenter="-6" verticalCenter="321.5"/>
	<e:Group height="383" width="959" x="-2" y="327" horizontalCenter="24.5" top="340">
		<e:EditableText id="_tel" width="700" y="280" height="61" x="214" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle" bold="true" size="35" prompt="请输入联系电话"/>
		<e:EditableText id="_name" width="700" height="61" x="216" y="149" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle" bold="true" size="35" prompt="请输入名字"/>
		<e:Label y="280" verticalAlign="middle" text="联系电话：" textAlign="center" width="189" height="61" x="19" size="35" bold="true"/>
		<e:Label text="姓名：" x="25" y="149" width="112" height="61" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" size="35" bold="true"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="EndPageSkin" width="1080" height="1920" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect bottom="0" y="40" top="0" right="0" width="1080" left="0" height="1920" alpha="0.5" x="40"/>
	<e:Image source="EndPageItem2" x="70" y="738" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-24.5"/>
	<e:Image source="EndPageItem3" x="411" y="183" verticalCenter="-805.5" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
	<e:Image source="EndPageItem4" x="278" y="555" verticalCenter="-436.5" horizontalCenter="-18"/>
	<e:Image id="_rankUiBt" source="EndPageItem1" x="727" y="739" horizontalCenter="324" verticalCenter="-229.5"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="_ScoreLabel" x="140" y="266" font="NumberFnt" text="0" width="796" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="-9" verticalCenter="-648.5"/>
	<e:Image id="RestBt" source="Button2" x="115" y="1552" horizontalCenter="-310" verticalCenter="573.5"/>
	<e:Image id="_RulesBt" source="Button8" x="603" y="1537" verticalCenter="570.5" horizontalCenter="302"/>
	<e:Group id="PlayerInfo1" height="404" width="310" x="704" y="778" verticalCenter="22" horizontalCenter="323">
		<e:Label id="_index1" x="144" y="20" text="1" bold="true" size="45" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
		<e:Label id="_name1" y="244" text="name" bold="true" size="45" x="30" width="245" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
		<e:Label id="_Score1" x="40" y="325" verticalAlign="middle" horizontalCenter="0" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="309" size="45" text="99999"/>
		<e:Image id="_headimg1" source="RankItem5" x="118" y="123" horizontalCenter="0" width="84" height="84"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="PlayerInfo2" y="788" horizontalCenter="2" verticalCenter="22" width="310" height="404" x="714">
		<e:Label id="_index2" y="20" text="2" bold="true" size="45" x="146" horizontalCenter="-0.5"/>
		<e:Image id="_headimg2" source="RankItem5" y="122" x="109" horizontalCenter="0" width="84" height="84"/>
		<e:Label id="_name2" x="24" y="242" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="245" size="45" text="name" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="PlayerInfo3" y="798" horizontalCenter="-322" verticalCenter="24" width="310" height="404" x="724">
		<e:Label id="_index3" y="20" text="3" bold="true" size="45" x="132" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
		<e:Image id="_headimg3" source="RankItem5" y="123" x="109" horizontalCenter="0" width="84" height="84"/>
		<e:Label id="_name3" y="244" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="245" size="45" text="name" x="34" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
		<e:Label id="_Score3" x="6" y="325" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="307" size="45" text="99999" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Label id="_Score2" y="1106" verticalAlign="middle" text="99999" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="305" size="45" x="389" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="RankUiSkin" width="1080" height="1920" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Rect bottom="0" y="50" top="0" right="0" width="1080" left="0" height="1920" alpha="0.5" x="50"/>
	<e:Group height="1920" width="1080" x="0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Image source="RankItem1" x="63" y="824"/>
		<e:Image source="RankItem4" x="159" y="431"/>
		<e:Image source="RankItem6" x="314" y="33"/>
		<e:Group id="_WinIndex2" height="428" width="242" x="169" y="295">
			<e:Image source="WinIndex2" x="70" y="4"/>
			<e:Image id="_headimg2" y="94" x="54" width="128" height="119" source="RankItem5"/>
			<e:Label id="_name2" text="名字" x="-2" y="228" width="238" height="96" textAlign="center" size="40" bold="true" verticalAlign="middle"/>
			<e:Label id="_scroe2" y="328" height="96" text="10000" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="238" size="40" verticalAlign="middle" x="-2"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="_WinIndex3" width="242" y="300" height="428" x="682">
			<e:Image y="49" x="70" source="WinIndex3"/>
			<e:Image id="_headimg3" source="RankItem5" width="128" y="141" height="119" x="56"/>
			<e:Label id="_name3" y="270" height="76" text="名字" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="238" size="40" verticalAlign="middle" x="0"/>
			<e:Label id="_scroe3" y="351" height="76" text="10000" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="238" size="40" verticalAlign="middle" x="1"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="_WinIndex1" width="242" y="187" height="536" x="416">
			<e:Image y="33" x="70" source="WinIndex1"/>
			<e:Image id="_headimg1" source="RankItem5" width="128" y="123" height="119" x="54"/>
			<e:Label id="_name1" y="251" height="120" text="名字" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="238" size="40" verticalAlign="middle" x="10"/>
			<e:Label id="_scroe1" y="440" size="40" text="10000" textAlign="center" bold="true" width="238" height="96" verticalAlign="middle" x="10"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Image id="RetureGame" source="Button4" x="337" y="1591"/>
		<e:Scroller width="944" height="528" x="72" y="918" scrollPolicyH="off" scrollPolicyV="on">
			<e:Group id="RankGourp">
			</e:Group>
		</e:Scroller>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MyLuckySkin" width="1080" height="1920" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect bottom="0" y="60" top="0" right="0" width="1080" left="0" height="1920" alpha="0.5" x="60"/>
	<e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="1080" height="1920" x="10" y="10">
		<e:Image y="171" x="231" source="MyLuckyTitle" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image source="MyLuckyItem" x="80" y="468" verticalCenter="-42" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image source="Button4" y="1590" x="347" id="RetureGame" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Scroller width="905" height="1139" x="89" y="360" scrollPolicyH="off" scrollPolicyV="auto">
			<e:Group id="ItemGourp" height="1115"/>
		</e:Scroller>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="RulesUiSkin" width="1080" height="1920" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect width="1080" y="0" height="1920" alpha="0.5" x="0" bottom="0" left="0" top="0" right="0"/>
	<e:Image source="RulesItem2" x="58" y="439" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-20"/>
	<e:Image source="RulesItem1" x="264" y="160" verticalCenter="-745.5" horizontalCenter="-11.5"/>
	<e:Image id="HideBt" source="Button4" x="452" y="1573" verticalCenter="699.5" horizontalCenter="-3"/>
